definition: to commit genocide/to become extinct/extinction of a race
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown
country destroyed, its people annihilated (idiom); total destruction

sentences.english: China's golden monkeys, one endangered species, have made a surprising comeback with populations.
sentences.chinese: 中國瀕臨滅種的種類，金絲猴族羣有了驚人的增長。

sentences.english: The smallest of the Palawan ethnoliguistic groups, is becoming extinct.
sentences.chinese: 巴拉望是人口最少的人種族羣，即將滅種。

sentences.english: There is no massacre or mass killings or genocides.
sentences.chinese: 沒有大屠殺或謀殺或滅種。

sentences.english: The chimpanzee is an endangered species .
sentences.chinese: 黑猩猩是瀕於滅種的動物。
